name: CORDYCEPS MORTALIS
description:
You need to escape.
You can try to fight, but you're running out of time. There are forces in your mind working against you. Can you free yourself and those you love?

My first game, a jailbreak challenge. There are many small choices (marked you so can tell which variables are affected) that will affect your fate. If you aren't sure, be sure to read carefully, you may notice something odd. There are many different outcomes to this story.

Warnings for body horror, profanity, violence, mind control, and death.
